// start by going through a cycle of the fsm

1111_1110_0_1_1000000 // B0
1111_1110_1_0_1000000 // R0

1111_1101_0_1_1000000 // R1

1111_0111_0_1_1000000 // R3
1111_1110_1_0_1000000 // B0

1011_1110_1_0_1000000 // R0
